title: crash: checking hyper with borrowck-migrate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: NLL-complete
labels.description: Working towards the "valid code works" goal

body:
````
git clone https://github.com/hyperium/hyper
cd hyper
git checkout v0.11.27
RUSTFLAGS="-Zborrowck=migrate" cargo check -j1

````
